TextBlock.Text: HYACINTH: This is the darkest spot yet, I might fall asleep.
HYACINTH: Not now though, at least I have to log my findings.
HYACINTH: So, there were two notable slide reels this time around, though one seemed.. atypical.
HYACINTH: For the first one, the inhabitants of this ship played a reel of what looks like their home, presumably grieving over it.
HYACINTH: Most of the contents are purged, but the intact slides depict them all going to sleep around a fire, just like I saw earlier. How.. long could they have they been there?
HYACINTH: A-anyways, the second reel showed some explosion coming from the light side of the ship, perhaps I have found my third entrance.
HYACINTH: We will find out soon, I just.. have to...
